long_description: A lightweight aluminum, premium-edition Dutch bike, the Electra Amsterdam Royal 8i bike offers an elegant combination of practicality, comfort and style for any ride around town. Designed with the smooth lines of a classic Dutch bicycle, the Amsterdam adeptly blends together old-school charm and modern luxuries. Flat Foot Technology(TM) geometry offers a relaxed, efficient pedaling position that also allows you to easily put both feet down on the ground when stopped. Shimano Nexus internally geared rear hub provides 8 smooth-shifting gears, and it's low-maintenance compared to conventional cassette and derailleur systems. Front hub dynamo generates power for a bright headlight; battery-operated red LED tail light enhances visibility in low light. Fully enclosed metal chain cover, front and rear fenders and metal skirt over the rear wheel help protect clothing from dirt and grease. Included Abus ring lock is mounted to the frame and offers light theft protection. Alloy rear rack. Platform pedals.
short_description: A lightweight aluminum, premium-edition Dutch bike, the Electra Amsterdam Royal 8i bike offers an elegant combination of practicality, comfort and style for any ride around town.
